trans-unit.source: Represents all or part of a story within an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Representerer hele eller deler av en artikkel i en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: An XPS story in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document is roughly analogous to a story in a newspaper or magazine.
trans-unit.target: En XPS artikkel i en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dokumentet er omtrent samme som en artikkel i en avis eller blad.

trans-unit.source: It is a passage of text and graphic content, usually on a single topic, within a single [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Det er et avsnitt med tekst og grafisk innhold, vanligvis på ett enkelt emne, i én [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Typically, it spans multiple pages, but it can be shorter than a page like a sidebar — boxed story — in a magazine.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis den går over flere sider, men det kan være kortere enn en side som en bakgrunnsartikkel – boks artikkel – i et blad.

trans-unit.source: A story can also be discontinuous like a front page newspaper story that is continued on page 4.
trans-unit.target: En artikkel kan også være usammenhengende som en front page-avisartikkel som fortsetter på side 4.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, a given page can have more than one story and parts of more than one story.
trans-unit.target: En gitt side kan derfor ha mer enn én artikkel og deler av mer enn én artikkel.

trans-unit.source: A header or footer is also a special kind of story that is entirely contained on a single page.
trans-unit.target: En topptekst eller bunntekst er også en spesiell type artikkel som befinner seg på én side.

trans-unit.source: A StoryFragment represents all or a portion of a story.
trans-unit.target: En StoryFragment som representerer alle eller en del av en artikkel.

trans-unit.source: It can never span more than one page, but it can occupy the whole of a page or share a page with other fragments.
trans-unit.target: Den kan aldri går over flere sider, men den kan ha hele på en side eller dele en side med andre fragmenter.

trans-unit.source: If a story is on more than one page, each part of it on each page is a separate fragment.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er en artikkel på mer enn én side, er hver deler av det på hver side separat fragmenter.

trans-unit.source: Although stories can have discontinuous sets of fragments, no fragment can itself be discontinuous.
trans-unit.target: Selv om artikler kan ha usammenhengende sett med fragmenter, være ingen fragment seg selv usammenhengende.

trans-unit.source: Only a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> element can be a parent of a StoryFragment.
trans-unit.target: Bare en <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments>elementet kan være en overordnet for et StoryFragment.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments>

trans-unit.source: The location of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryBreak> elements within a StoryFragment indicates if the story is contained in multiple fragments, and if the additional fragments either precede or follow the current fragment.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av den <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryBreak>elementer i en StoryFragment angir Hvis artikkelen finnes i flere fragmenter, og hvis flere fragmenter foregående eller etterfølgende gjeldende fragmentet.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryBreak>

trans-unit.source: When a StoryFragment ends in the middle of some structural element; say a `<TableRowGroupStructure>`, then [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document-producing applications must insert an appropriate end tag for the element (in this case `</TableRowGroupStructure>`) before the `</StoryFragment>` tag, even though the structure is being continued in a later fragment.
trans-unit.target: Når en StoryFragment slutter midt i en strukturell elementet; si en `<TableRowGroupStructure>`, deretter [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dokumentet produserer programmer må sette inn en riktig sluttkoden for elementet (i dette tilfellet `</TableRowGroupStructure>`) før den `</StoryFragment>` kode, selv om strukturen fortsetter i en nyere fragmentet.

trans-unit.source: (This is necessary to ensure that the element tree within the StoryFragment is valid XML.) The fragment that continues the story must begin with an opening tag for the interrupted structure.
trans-unit.target: (Dette er nødvendig for å sørge for at treet elementet i StoryFragment gyldig XML.) Fragmentet som fortsetter artikkelen må begynne med en åpningskoden for avbrutt strukturen.

trans-unit.source: The entire tree of interrupted structures must be treated the same way (with one exception, discussed below): End tags must be added for every unmatched start tag above the point of interruption.
trans-unit.target: Hele treet med avbrutt strukturer må behandles på samme måte (med ett-unntak som beskrevet nedenfor): End-koder må legges til for hver unike startkoden over punktet avbruddet.

trans-unit.source: The exception applies when the story interruption comes immediately after a `</TableCellStructure>` tag, then the producing application must insert an empty table cell structure (`<TableCellStructure></TableCellStructure>`) at the corresponding point in the fragment that continues the story.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket gjelder når artikkelen avbrudd kommer rett etter en `</TableCellStructure>` kode, og lage programmet må sette inn en tom tabell celle struktur (`<TableCellStructure></TableCellStructure>`) på det tilsvarende punktet i fragmentet som fortsetter artikkelen.

trans-unit.source: This is necessary so that consuming applications that need to merge all fragments of a given story can use a simple algorithm to do this.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nødvendig slik at forbruk programmer som trenger å slå sammen alle fragmenter for en gitt artikkel kan bruke en enkel algoritme for å gjøre dette.

trans-unit.source: Assume, for example, that an application wanted to add the following material to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document: ``` <SectionStructure> <TableStructure> <TableRowGroupStructure> <TableRowStructure> <TableCellStructure> <ParagraphStructure> <NamedElement NameReference="SomeContent" /> </ParagraphStructure> </TableCellStructure> <TableCellStructure> <ParagraphStructure> <NamedElement NameReference="MoreContent" /> </ParagraphStructure> </TableCellStructure> </TableRowStructure> <TableRowStructure> <TableCellStructure> <ParagraphStructure> <NamedElement NameReference="EvenMoreContent" /> </ParagraphStructure> </TableCellStructure> <TableCellStructure> <ParagraphStructure> <NamedElement NameReference="LastContent" /> </ParagraphStructure> </TableCellStructure> </TableRowStructure> </TableRowGroupStructure> </TableStructure> </SectionStructure> ``` If a page break forces an end to the fragment just after the `</TableCellStructure>` for "SomeContent", the application must create the split as shown in the following example: ``` <StoryFragment StoryName="MyStory" FragmentType="Content"> <SectionStructure> <TableStructure> <TableRowGroupStructure> <TableRowStructure> <TableCellStructure> <ParagraphStructure> <NamedElement NameReference="SomeContent" /> </ParagraphStructure> </TableCellStructure> <!-- lines from here to end of fragment added by producer--> </TableRowStructure> </TableRowGroupStructure> </TableStructure> </SectionStructure> </StoryFragment> <StoryFragment StoryName="MyStory" FragmentType="Content"> <SectionStructure> <TableStructure> <TableRowGroupStructure> <TableRowStructure> <TableCellStructure> <!-- extra cell added by producer--> </TableCellStructure> <!-- lines from here to start of fragment added by producer--> <TableCellStructure> <ParagraphStructure> <NamedElement NameReference="MoreContent" /> </ParagraphStructure> </TableCellStructure> </TableRowStructure> <TableRowStructure> <TableCellStructure> <ParagraphStructure> <NamedElement NameReference="EvenMoreContent" /> </ParagraphStructure> </TableCellStructure> <TableCellStructure> <ParagraphStructure> <NamedElement NameReference="LastContent" /> </ParagraphStructure> </TableCellStructure> </TableRowStructure> </TableRowGroupStructure> </TableStructure> </SectionStructure> </StoryFragment> ``` An application that reads the document might need to merge this content.
trans-unit.target: Tar, for eksempel at et program vil legge til følgende materiale til en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dokument: ``` <SectionStructure> <TableStructure> <TableRowGroupStructure> <TableRowStructure> <TableCellStructure> <ParagraphStructure> <NamedElement NameReference="SomeContent" /> </ParagraphStructure> </TableCellStructure> <TableCellStructure> <ParagraphStructure> <NamedElement NameReference="MoreContent" /> </ParagraphStructure> </TableCellStructure> </TableRowStructure> <TableRowStructure> <TableCellStructure> <ParagraphStructure> <NamedElement NameReference="EvenMoreContent" /> </ParagraphStructure> </TableCellStructure> <TableCellStructure> <ParagraphStructure> <NamedElement NameReference="LastContent" /> </ParagraphStructure> </TableCellStructure> </TableRowStructure> </TableRowGroupStructure> </TableStructure> </SectionStructure> ``` Hvis et sideskift en avslutning til fragmentet bare når den `</TableCellStructure>` for "SomeContent" programmet må opprette delingen som vises i følgende eksempel: ``` <StoryFragment StoryName="MyStory" FragmentType="Content"> <SectionStructure> <TableStructure> <TableRowGroupStructure> <TableRowStructure> <TableCellStructure> <ParagraphStructure> <NamedElement NameReference="SomeContent" /> </ParagraphStructure> </TableCellStructure> <!-- lines from here to end of fragment added by producer--> </TableRowStructure> </TableRowGroupStructure> </TableStructure> </SectionStructure> </StoryFragment> <StoryFragment StoryName="MyStory" FragmentType="Content"> <SectionStructure> <TableStructure> <TableRowGroupStructure> <TableRowStructure> <TableCellStructure> <!-- extra cell added by producer--> </TableCellStructure> <!-- lines from here to start of fragment added by producer--> <TableCellStructure> <ParagraphStructure> <NamedElement NameReference="MoreContent" /> </ParagraphStructure> </TableCellStructure> </TableRowStructure> <TableRowStructure> <TableCellStructure> <ParagraphStructure> <NamedElement NameReference="EvenMoreContent" /> </ParagraphStructure> </TableCellStructure> <TableCellStructure> <ParagraphStructure> <NamedElement NameReference="LastContent" /> </ParagraphStructure> </TableCellStructure> </TableRowStructure> </TableRowGroupStructure> </TableStructure> </SectionStructure> </StoryFragment> ``` et program som leser dokumentet må kanskje flette dette innholdet.

trans-unit.source: Consider, for example, an XPS viewer with a **Copy Whole Story to Clipboard** button; or an **XPS for the Blind** application that passed stories to a voice synthesizer.
trans-unit.target: Du bør vurdere å, for eksempel en XPS viewer med en **kopi hele artikkelen til utklippstavlen** button; eller en **XPS for Blind** program som ble sendt artikler til en stemme synthesizer.

trans-unit.source: Some applications that read the document may need to merge a subset of the fragments of a story.
trans-unit.target: Noen programmer som lese dokumentet må flette et delsett av fragmenter for en artikkel.

trans-unit.source: For example, a feature that copies a whole paragraph to the clipboard by triple-clicking it would need to do a merge whenever the paragraph spanned a page break, because such a paragraph would be split between two StoryFragments.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en funksjon som kopierer et helt avsnitt til utklippstavlen ved tre ganger å klikke må den har en fletting når avsnittet for et sideskift fordi slike avsnitt vil bli delt mellom to StoryFragments.

trans-unit.source: **To merge use this algorithm:** 1.
trans-unit.target: **Flette bruker denne algoritmen:** 1.

trans-unit.source: Delete the `</StoryFragment>` from the end of the first fragment to be merged and delete the `<StoryFragment>` from the beginning of the second.
trans-unit.target: Slett den `</StoryFragment>` fra slutten av første fragmentet slås sammen for å slette den `<StoryFragment>` fra begynnelsen av sekundet.

trans-unit.source: If the last closing tag of the first fragment is of the same type as the first opening tag of the second fragment (and they are not `<NamedElement>` tags), delete them both.
trans-unit.target: Hvis siste avslutningskoden for første fragmentet er av samme type som første åpningskoden andre fragmentet (og de er ikke `<NamedElement>` koder), slette dem. begge.

trans-unit.source: Repeat step 2 until the two fragments are in *either* of these states: - There is no longer a type match between the last end tag of the leading fragment the first start tag of the trailing fragment.
trans-unit.target: Gjenta trinn 2 før to fragmentene står i *enten* av disse statuser: – Det er ikke lenger en type samsvar mellom siste sluttkoden for innledende fragmentet første startkoden av avsluttende fragmentet.

trans-unit.source: - The last end tag of the leading fragment the first start tag of the trailing fragment are both `<NamedElement>` tags.
trans-unit.target: -Siste sluttkoden av ledende fragmenter første startkoden av avsluttende fragmentet begge `<NamedElement>` koder.

trans-unit.source: In the example above, if the empty cell had not been added by the producing application, then a merger of the fragments would produce a table whose first row had only one cell containing both the "SomeContent" and "MoreContent" references instead of the original first row with two cells, each containing a single reference When the entire story is being merged, the algorithm should be repeated for each subsequent fragment that is part of the same story.
trans-unit.target: I eksemplet ovenfor hvis den tomme cellen ikke har blitt lagt til av programmet lage vil deretter en sammenslåing av fragmentene lage en tabell der første raden har bare én celle som inneholder både "SomeContent" og "MoreContent"-referanser i stedet for den opprinnelige første raden med to celler, hver med et enkelt referanse når hele artikkelen er slått sammen , algoritmen skal gjentas for hver etterfølgende fragment som en del av samme artikkel.

trans-unit.source: The fragments that belong to a story are indexed in the `<Story>` element.
trans-unit.target: Fragmenter som hører til en artikkel indekseres i den `<Story>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: See section 9.1.15 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Se 9.1.15 i den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] spesifikasjonen som du kan få på [XPS: spesifikasjonen og lisens lastet ned](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: The last fragment for a given story will have a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryBreak> element as its last child.
trans-unit.target: Siste fragmentet for en gitt artikkel får en <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryBreak>elementet som det siste underordnet.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryBreak>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Add a block to the story fragment.
trans-unit.target: Legg til en blokk fragmentet artikkel.

trans-unit.source: The block to add.
trans-unit.target: Blokker ikke legge til.

trans-unit.source: The block passed is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Blokker sendt er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the story fragment.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på fragmentet artikkel.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `FragmentName` attribute of the `</StoryFragment>` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, see chapter 9 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om den `FragmentName` for den `</StoryFragment>` del av en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] dokument, se fant 9 for den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] spesifikasjonen som du kan få på [XPS: spesifikasjonen og lisens lastet ned](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the name of this fragment.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>representerer navnet på dette fragmentet.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of fragment.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir typen fragment.

trans-unit.source: Possible values include "Header," "Footer," and "Content."
trans-unit.target: Mulige verdier inkluderer "Topptekst", "Bunntekst" og "Innhold."

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `FragmentType` attribute of the `</StoryFragment>` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, see chapter 9 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om den `FragmentType` for den `</StoryFragment>` del av en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] dokument, se fant 9 for den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] spesifikasjonen som du kan få på [XPS: spesifikasjonen og lisens lastet ned](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the type of fragment.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som representerer typen fragment.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the story.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på artikkelen.

trans-unit.source: All fragments of a given story must have the same value for this property.
trans-unit.target: Alle fragmenter for en gitt artikkel må ha samme verdi for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: It must match the `StoryName` attribute of the `<Story>` element.
trans-unit.target: Det må samsvare med den `StoryName` for den `<Story>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: See section 9.1.15 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Se 9.1.15 i den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] spesifikasjonen som du kan få på [XPS: spesifikasjonen og lisens lastet ned](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: This property can be unspecified if <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment.FragmentType%2A> is Header or Footer.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan være angitt Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment.FragmentType%2A>er toppteksten eller bunnteksten.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment.FragmentType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the name of the story.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>representerer navnet på artikkelen.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: This method has not been implemented.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er ikke implementert.

trans-unit.source: Always raises <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer alltid <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Verdien støtter det [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastruktur og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object to the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment>.
trans-unit.target: Legger til et underordnet objekt <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment>

trans-unit.source: There must be at least one child of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment> and the children can only be of these types: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ParagraphStructure>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.FigureStructure>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListStructure>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.TableStructure>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.SectionStructure>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryBreak>.
trans-unit.target: Det må finnes minst én underordnet den <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment>og underordnede kan bare være av disse typene: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ParagraphStructure>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.FigureStructure>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListStructure>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.TableStructure>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.SectionStructure>, og <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryBreak>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryBreak> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.SectionStructure> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.TableStructure> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListStructure> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.FigureStructure> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ParagraphStructure> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryBreak> can only be the first or last child of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryBreak>kan bare være første eller siste underordnede for et <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryBreak>

trans-unit.source: The child <xref:System.Object> that is added.
trans-unit.target: Underordnet <xref:System.Object>som er lagt til.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: value is not one of the types that can be a child of this class.
trans-unit.target: valueer ikke en av typene som kan være en underordnet av denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: See **Remarks**.
trans-unit.target: Se **merknader**.

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: Legger til tekstinnhold i en node i objektet.

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: Teksten du vil legge til objektet.
